alert.note: Alert for Adams; Taylor (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 9:03PM CDT until May 07 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Adams County in southwestern Iowa... Western Taylor County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 903 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Carbon to near Clarinda to near Westboro, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Corning, Carbon and Corning Municipal Airport around 910 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include New Market, Lenox and Gravity. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
